description: Erection of three separate blocks of four storeys (Block 1) and six storeys (Blocks 2 & 3) to provide 75 residential flats (18 one-bedroom flats, 26 two-bedroom flats, 27 three-bedroom flats and 4 four-bedroom flats), a two-storey block which links Blocks 1 to 3 to provide 1970 sqm B1 (business) floorspace, and a separate four-storey building of 2338 sqm for D1 (Secondary School) floorspace.  The proposal will also provide 47 car parking spaces (including 9 disabled) and landscaping with public access to the River Lea including the retention of the existing black crane.
